todos.title: Buy groceries
todos.description: Purchase milk, eggs, bread, and vegetables from the supermarket.

todos.title: Finish project report
todos.description: Complete the final draft of the quarterly project report and submit it by 5 PM.

todos.title: Workout
todos.description: Go to the gym for a 1-hour workout, focusing on cardio and strength training.

todos.title: Call Mom
todos.description: Check in with Mom and discuss plans for the weekend.

todos.title: Read a book
todos.description: Read 30 pages of 'Atomic Habits' before going to bed.
